mapper.select: select a.id, a.sender, a.sender_sex, a.recipient, a.recipient_sex, a.create_time, a.content, a.thumbs_up, COALESCE(count(b.id), 0) as comment_count from biaobai.post a left join biaobai.`comment` b on b.p_id = a.id group by a.id order by a.create_time DESC limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};

select a.id, a.sender, a.sender_sex, a.recipient, a.recipient_sex, a.create_time, a.content, a.thumbs_up, COALESCE(count(b.id), 0) as comment_count from biaobai.post a left join biaobai.`comment` b on b.p_id = a.id where a.id = #{id} group by a.id;

select a.id, a.sender, a.sender_sex, a.recipient, a.recipient_sex, a.create_time, a.content, a.thumbs_up, COALESCE(count(b.id), 0) as comment_count from biaobai.post a left join biaobai.`comment` b on b.p_id = a.id where a.sender like "%"#{keyword}"%" or a.recipient like "%"#{keyword}"%" or a.content like "%"#{keyword}"%" group by a.id order by a.create_time DESC limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
select count(1) from biaobai.post where sender like "%"#{keyword}"%" or recipient like "%"#{keyword}"%" or content like "%"#{keyword}"%";
mapper.insert: insert into biaobai.post (sender, sender_sex, recipient, recipient_sex, create_time, content) value (#{sender},#{senderSex},#{recipient},#{recipientSex},now(),#{content});
